description_zh: 中国最大的开源与 AI 技术社区之一，拥有超过 1100 万的注册用户。
description_en: One of China's largest open-source and AI technology communities, with over 11 million registered users.
rating_zh: 允许开发者发布他们的开源项目并与社区互动。
rating_en: Allow developers to publish their open-source projects and interact with the community.
